overview: Archons is the story of falling-from-grace rock group, Sled Dog, half a decade after the release of their hit single, Backfire. After a chance encounter with rock-legend and life-long idol, Emerson Gilmore, Eric is willing to take one more chance at success, the way Emerson Gilmore did it back in the 70sâ€”out in the Canadian mountains with a guitar and a bag of psychedelic drugs.

production_companies.name: A Farewell to Kings Entertainment Company

title: Archons
